thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 6 of 1742
thread.title: Negar

author: Negar
title: Negar
text: I bought a return ticket but after purchase was completed I noticed that one of the legs was replaced with another flight; an impossible flight: a flight that would have been left before my arrival. After calling the customer support several times and hours of explaining the situation, finally one of the personnel understood the problem and assured me that she will solve it. However, the next day I got an email from FlightHub that my booking was cancelled!! A waste of time ...
